summary: Funnyman George Lopez stars in this family misadventure as a dad who volunteers to chaperone his daughter's camping troop - unaware he'll be the only guy in a world of girls.
cast: George Lopez|Daniela Bobadilla|Jane Lynch|Julia Benson|Elizabeth Thai|April Telek|Pyper De Marsh|Jessica McLeod|Laine MacNeil|Jianna Ballard|Mayan Lopez|Geoff Gustafson|Alex Wolff|Nat Wolff|Cole Heppell|Cainan Wiebe|Paul Jarrett|Debbie Podowski|Chris Gauthier|Alvin Sanders|BJ Harrison|Samir El Sharkawi
title: Mr. Troop Mom
